name: Sundar Vishwanathan
content: Home page of Sundar Vishwanathan Sundar Vishwanathan Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering SI-108 (101). First floor. Opposite Dept. Library. Kresit Building. Indian Institute of Technology Powai, Mumbai 400076, India Telephone: (+91-22) 2576-7727; (+91-22) 2572-2545, Ext 7727. Home: (+91-22) 2576-8727; Fax: (+91-22) 2579-4290 E-mail: sundar (AT) cse iitb ac in Research Interests Publications Courses I teach Other Interests Research interests Algorithms, Combinatorics, Complexity Theory. Publications DBLP List of Publications Courses that I have offered CS 779   -  Extremal Combinatorics Introduction to the course CS 608  -  Approximation Algorithms CS 601 -  Algorithms and Complexity CS 604 -  Combinatorics Introduction to the course Tutorial 1 CS 201 -  Discrete Structures CS 218 -  Design and Analysis of Algorithms CS 435 -  Linear Optimization Linear Optimization Lecture Notes (incomplete) Other Interests Music. Tai-Chi.
